title: Exchange Email
author: Exchange Email
content: whatever you mine is your business, send us your coin details and wallet info and we mine for you 24hrs (set schedule) using hiveos* as you already know hash rates depends on your coinstart time when mining starts not config time then 24hrs from there.easy as pie$20 per "day" per "12 3080" GPUs (min of 2 days required)prices per day may change based on market, your price is locked in when booking.Quotebecause of type of business, payments using "zelle, cashapp, chime or with other coins"cc will not be accepted. DM for questions or open a ticket "info@hub.nocroom.com" Thank youclosing ticket
